body: holy shit the plot is all over the place just like evangelion
So what is the story of Dulce Report 2?

According to what I understood, the girl with the telescope was a man who changed sex, and had relations with another girl who had futanari, there were some snails that return futanari to everyone and somehow through sex they saved the world (? ) but the futanari girl died and the girl with glasses got pregnant? the second part tells how her daughter is the living image of her former beloved and in some way becomes her? and then a new villain appears and using those rare snails do all this shit (?) Then through sex they come back to solve and save the world? And now your daughter got pregnant with her mother and they had another daughter and this will be repeated again? I think the author smoked a big cigar with this story
It took so long that i learned japanese.Thanks BM/Q.
impressed that dulce report keeps getting worse.
So, she had a daughter with her daughter...

dont know the detail. but it seems same things in MGS, where liquid snake (aoi) manage to take over ocelot (yukari) body. so they decide to transfer yukari into new baby. and aoi take over yukari body.
